backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles with access control checks for viewing and saving profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions of their purpose and functionality.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: Asset and caching configuration defining headers and cache rules for static files including favicon, sitemap, and robots.txt.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Deployment checklist outlining required build, publish, and verification steps to prevent blank-screen issues.
frontend/DOMAIN_SETUP.md: Guide for configuring custom domain DNS, redirects, and SEO canonicalization for sangharshclasses.in.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with favicon tags, SEO metadata, structured data, and Vite development script reference.
frontend/public/_headers: Headers configuration specifying correct Content-Type for sitemap, robots, and favicon files.
frontend/public/_redirects: Redirect rules excluding static files from SPA fallback and routing all other paths to index.html.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects non-static routes to root while excluding specific static files from redirection.
frontend/public/google53082ab74af04c28.h: Empty Google Search Console verification file for domain ownership.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing full crawling and pointing to the sitemap URL.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing the homepage with metadata for search indexing.
frontend/src/admin/AdminShell.tsx: Empty placeholder file for admin shell component.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminAuthP: Empty placeholder for the admin authentication panel component.
Empty placeholder for admin route protection component.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminToast: Empty placeholder for admin toast notifications module.
frontend/src/admin/components/ConfirmDel: Empty placeholder for a delete confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/admin/components/ProfileSet: Empty placeholder for profile setup modal UI.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AboutEditorPage: Empty placeholder for admin About section editor page.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminHome.tsx: Empty placeholder for admin dashboard home page.
Empty placeholder for admin user management page.
frontend/src/admin/pages/ContactEditorPa: Empty placeholder for admin contact section editor page.
frontend/src/admin/pages/CoursesManagerP: Empty placeholder for admin course manager page.
frontend/src/admin/pages/FacultyManagerP: Empty placeholder for admin faculty manager page.
frontend/src/admin/pages/LayoutSectionsP: Empty placeholder for admin layout sections configuration page.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app initializing diagnostics and SEO guards and rendering HomePage within an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: Renders the About section with paragraphs describing the institute and a feature card highlighting result‑oriented teaching.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Implements a React error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays a fallback component.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Provides a contact section with phone, email, location, and quick‑action buttons for calling, WhatsApp, and email.
frontend/src/components/Courses.tsx: Displays a grid of courses for classes 7–12 with descriptions and feature highlights like tests and expert faculty.
frontend/src/components/DomainSetupDialo: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/Faculty.tsx: Shows faculty cards with photos, subjects, experience, and specialization details.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the footer containing about info, quick links, contact details, and social media icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements a responsive header with scroll effects, navigation links, and a mobile slide‑out menu.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image, headings, CTA buttons, and animated stats; includes scroll-to-section handlers.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorFall: Displays an error card with refresh and home navigation buttons when runtime errors occur.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Floating WhatsApp contact button opening a chat to a predefined number.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActorSafe.t: Creates a backend actor with optional safe admin-initialization and logs non-fatal failures.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity persistence handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving the caller’s user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom color variables, dark mode, animations, and scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page composing header, main sections, footer, and floating WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/utils/runtimeDiagnostics.ts: Production diagnostics utilities logging runtime errors, promise rejections, and component render starts.
frontend/src/utils/seoGuards.ts: SEO guards enforcing canonical URLs and noindex rules on non-canonical domains.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), manage stored values in sessionStorage, and sync URL params with persistent storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, radii, animations, plugins, and content paths.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Defines Vite build and dev server settings, React plugin setup, env var injection, and asset output configuration.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, versioning, and a detailed feature list for the frontend and backend.
